005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.MetaschemaDataTypeProvider;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidValueForCastFunctionException;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
011
012import java.time.Period;
013
014import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
015
016public interface IYearMonthDurationItem extends IDurationItem {
017  /**
018   * Construct a new year month day duration item using the provided string
019   * {@code value}.
020   *
021   * @param value
022   *          a string representing a year month day duration
023   * @return the new item
024   */
025  @NonNull
026  static IYearMonthDurationItem valueOf(@NonNull String value) {
027    try {
028      Period period = ObjectUtils.notNull(MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.YEAR_MONTH_DURATION.parse(value).withDays(0));
029      return valueOf(period);
030    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
031      throw new InvalidValueForCastFunctionException(String.format("Unable to parse string value '%s'", value),
032          ex);
033    }
034  }
035
036  /**
037   * Construct a new year month day duration item using the provided
038   * {@code value}.
039   *
040   * @param value
041   *          a duration
042   * @return the new item
043   */
044  @NonNull
045  static IYearMonthDurationItem valueOf(@NonNull Period value) {
046    return new YearMonthDurationItemImpl(ObjectUtils.notNull(value.withDays(0)));
047  }
048
049  /**
050   * Construct a new year month day duration item using the provided values.
051   *
052   * @param years
053   *          the number of years in the period
054   * @param months
055   *          the number of months in the period
056   * @return the new item
057   */
058  @SuppressWarnings("null")
059  @NonNull
060  static IYearMonthDurationItem valueOf(int years, int months) {
061    return valueOf(Period.of(years, months, 0));
062  }
063
064  /**
065   * Cast the provided type to this item type.
066   *
067   * @param item
068   *          the item to cast
069   * @return the original item if it is already this type, otherwise a new item
070   *         cast to this type
071   * @throws InvalidValueForCastFunctionException
072   *           if the provided {@code item} cannot be cast to this type
073   */
074  @NonNull
075  static IYearMonthDurationItem cast(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem item) {
076    return MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.YEAR_MONTH_DURATION.cast(item);
077  }
078
079  /**
080   * Get the "wrapped" duration value.
081   *
082   * @return the underlying duration value
083   */
084  @NonNull
085  Period asPeriod();
086
087  @Override
088  default IYearMonthDurationItem castAsType(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
089    return cast(item);
090  }
091
092  @Override
093  default int compareTo(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
094    return compareTo(cast(item));
095  }
096
097  /**
098   * Compares this value with the argument.
099   *
100   * @param item
101   *          the item to compare with this value
102   * @return a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer if this value is less
103   *         than, equal to, or greater than the {@code item}.
104   */
105  default int compareTo(IYearMonthDurationItem item) {
106    Period thisPeriod = asPeriod().normalized();
107    Period thatPeriod = item.asPeriod().normalized();
108
109    int result = Integer.compare(thisPeriod.getYears(), thatPeriod.getYears());
110    return result == 0 ? Integer.compare(thisPeriod.getMonths(), thatPeriod.getMonths()) : result;
111  }
112}
